fields.name: Basic
fields.message: You have selected the Basic Plan, just send us an additional bit of information to complete registration.
fields.message_es: Has seleccionado el Plan Básico, envíanos un poco más de información para completar tu registro.

fields.name: Agile
fields.message: You have selected the Agile Plan, just send us an additional bit of information to complete registration.
fields.message_es: Has seleccionado el Plan Ágil, envíanos un poco más de información para completar tu registro.

fields.name: Custom
fields.message: You have selected the Custom Plan, we will call you once you register.
fields.message_es: Has seleccionado el Plan Personalizado, te llamaremos una vez completes tu registro.
